item.title: Chainlink VRF and Automation Services
item.description: Chainlink VRF (Verifiable Random Function) and Chainlink Automation are two distinct services provided by Chainlink that offer different functionalities for smart contracts on blockchain networks. Chainlink VRF is a provably fair and verifiable random number generator (RNG) designed for smart contracts that require a high degree of randomness, such as in gaming or for the random assignment of duties and resources. It generates random values along with cryptographic proof of how those values were determined.
